Package com.tloj.game.entities.mobs

Class JunkSlime

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.entities.Entity
com.tloj.game.entities.CombatEntity
com.tloj.game.entities.Mob
com.tloj.game.entities.mobs.JunkSlime
public class JunkSlime extends Mob
Represents the JunkSlime Mob entity in the game.
The JunkSlime is a resilient enemy that can be found in the game. It deals low damage, but has a high health and defense.
It has 16 health points
3 attack points
3 defense points
4 dice faces
6 experience points drop
2 money drop.
It has the CyberPoison ability
See Also:
